meanings.definition: Constituting number sixteen in a sequence.
meanings.sent1: She was excited to celebrate her sixteenth birthday with her friends.
meanings.sent2: The sixteenth cupcake in the row was decorated with pink frosting.
meanings.sent3: The sixteenth cookie in the jar magically disappeared overnight.
meanings.sent4: His sixteenth attempt at solving the puzzle finally paid off.
meanings.sent5: The sixteenth star in the sky twinkled brightly.

meanings.definition: One of sixteen equal parts of a whole.
meanings.sent1: She ate a sixteenth of the pizza and saved the rest for later.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for adding a sixteenth of a teaspoon of salt.
meanings.sent3: He only had a sixteenth of the total amount needed for the project.
meanings.sent4: The tiny island was just a sixteenth of the size of the mainland.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully painted one sixteenth of the canvas at a time.

meanings.sent1: Her birthday falls on the sixteenth of December.
meanings.sent2: They reached the checkpoint on the sixteenth of the month.
meanings.sent3: The sixteenth in line won a special prize.
meanings.sent4: He finished the race in the sixteenth position.
meanings.sent5: The sixteenth page of the book contained a surprising twist.
